annonstext:
The banking and finance industry is undergoing major change. We are driving change with a sustainability-centric approach and aim to lead development within our area of housing and household finances. Changed customer behavior and digitalization with increased transparency are creating major opportunities for us, and we are growing and capturing market shares. Our values-driven way of working with inclusive leadership and self-driven employees is decisively and rapidly moving us forward.

Are you looking for an ambitious and forward-thinking company with a modern tech stack, challenger culture and real contributions to society? Do you like to work smart, quick and sustainable? Let’s discuss what SBAB can offer you.

About the role / what you’ll do

Our teams are working towards making SBAB an awesome digital bank and we are looking for Android developers who want to join our teams in this amazing journey. You will have ownership of the product and creative freedom to solve your tasks together with your teammates.

If you thrive on complex systems where you get to use your mind and create a sustainable platform for our future, then you will be a valued member of our team. As a part of our team you will be an important player in solving our team’s challenges, deciding the way forward both technically and work-wise.

What will you work on?

- Working with different extreme programming practices, pair-programming, mob programming and anything else that you want to try.
- Creating solutions for new features and improving our current code base.
- Participating in team decisions regarding the product, features, architecture and business goals.
- Learning and sharing knowledge not only with the team but with the entire organization.
- We have a modern tech stack, which consists of Kotlin, Android architecture components, Coroutines, Dagger, Hilt
- We believe in Continuous Integration, and we deploy to Google Play all the way through Jenkins.
- Working with and improving our architecture and improving the app's usability and accessibility.

About you [Our next co-worker]

You are a team player who enjoys turning great ideas into features and knows how to balance quality and delivery.

You like to leave your comfort zone to work on different technologies and are eager to learn things out of your expertise.

You have a skillset that makes a difference to accomplish our shared goals.

We think that you are experienced in our Tech stack (or parts of it) and well familiar with agile methodologies - e.g. Scrum, Kanban.

About SBAB / TECH

At SBAB, we have a strong set of beliefs with a clear vision, mission, and values that guide us in how we lead and how we act towards each other and our customers.

For us, at TECH it comes naturally to think and work after the principle “Build - Measure - Learn”. It’s important to dare to experiment, try, fail and learn all the time. We don’t ignore the lessons learned, even those learned by others.

Benefits

- Flexible working hours
- 30 days paid vacation
- Pension and insurance package
- A private gym and a garage for bikes
- A generous amount you can spend on gym and likewise
- Lots of social hang-outs, FIRSTNAME LASTNAME, Fussball, Board Game tournaments etc.

Apply

If you like who we are and believe you are the person we are looking for, do not hesitate and submit your CV, LinkedIn profile or why not another innovative way that shows who you are.

We know that our environment is always evolving, a diverse organization will help us achieve the best possible result.

We know that our environment is always evolving, a diverse organization will help us achieve the best possible result.

SBAB was founded in 1985 and is owned by the Swedish state. Our business idea is to be mindful and innovative in our offering of loan and savings products to consumers, tenant-owners' associations, and property companies in Sweden. We are continuously developing our customer offering in order to achieve differentiation on the mortgage market, increase our long-term competitiveness, and fulfill our vision - to offer the best mortgages in Sweden. Consequently, we have integrated Booli in our operations. Booli develops products and services focusing on the housing market. SBAB contributes to better housing and household finances and therefore works with the UN’s SDGs and the 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development. The SDGs are integrated in SBAB’s sustainable governance model and our operations. SBAB has highly satisfied customers according to Swedish Quality Index (SKI) and according to Great Place to Work, SBAB ranks as one of the best workplaces in Sweden among large companies. We have about 500,000 customers and employ around 800 people.
